title: The Fugitive S01E12 Glass Tightrope DVDRip DivX
description:
The Fugitive Season 1 (1963)
S01E12 Glass Tightrope

First aired: 12/3/1963 
Working as a stock clerk in a department store, Kimble witnesses his boss, Martin Rowland, accidentally kill a business associate in the parking lot after hours. When Kimble learns that a local vagrant found near the crime scene is the prime suspect, Kimble anonymously phones Rowland to get him to confess to the murder. But Rowland and his wife, Ginny, thinking that the caller is blackmailing them, hires the store detective, Angstrom, to find the person "blackmailing" Rowland. Leslie Nielsen guest stars, Ida Lupino directs.

Cast: David Janssen as Dr. Richard Kimble, Barry Morse as Lt. Philip Gerard, Bill Raisch as Fred Johnson (The One-Armed Man), Diane Brewster (flashbacks) as Helen Kimble, J.D.Cannon as Lloyd Chandler, William Conrad as Narrator (voice)

Guest cast: Jud Taylor (Floyd) , Leslie Nielsen (Rowland), Edward Binns (Angstrom), Diana Van der Vlis (Ginny), Robert Quarry (Pascoe), Dort Clark (Kronas), Jay Adler (Tibbetts), Tom Palmer (D. A.), Warren Parker (Lewis) 
Writer: Robert C. Dennis, Robert C. Dennis, Barry Trivers 
Director: Ida Lupino
